text: Emile Jansen (21 November 1959 â€“ 18 November 2024) was a Dutch stage, television and movie actor. Jansen studied at Gymnasium Apeldoorn and afterwards the drama school in Arnhem. In the theatre he played under the direction of in plays by John Steinbeck, Sam Shepard and . Jansen became most known for playing in the television series like Goede tijden, slechte tijden as detective Huibert Remonder; Zeg 'ns Aaa and . He also played in several movies including Winter in Wartime. Jansen died on 18 November 2024, at the age of 64. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at Theater Encyclopedie Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:1959 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from Apeldoorn Category:Place of death missing
title: Emile Jansen
